definition: to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: A massive sculpture of the seated Buddha rests in the yellowish sandstone cliffs at Single Pebble Village(Danzishizhen) just east of Chongqing.
sentences.chinese: 大佛坐落於重慶東部彈子石鎮附近一處黃砂岩懸崖上。

sentences.english: I beat Dick in billiards because he gave me tremendous odds.
sentences.chinese: 打彈子球我贏了迪克，因爲他讓了我很多。

sentences.english: They will help you determine how much of your cash you want to put into the online Pachinko machine.
sentences.chinese: 他們將幫助您確定您的現金，要放置到在線彈子機了。

sentences.english: It seems to join the billiard-room on purpose.
sentences.chinese: 它與彈子房相通，好像有意滿足我們的需要似的。

sentences.english: Disk-tumbler locks are often used in desks and file cabinets.
sentences.chinese: 磁盤彈子鎖通常用於辦公桌和文件櫃。

sentences.english: When homework is assigned, do not moan or complain.
sentences.chinese: 老師抱怨迪克在彈子房鬼混，不做功課。

sentences.english: Just let's consider how long a row of ten million marbles would be.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們想象一下一千萬顆彈子排起來有多長。
打彈子游戲就此開始咯。

sentences.english: Then, all of a sudden, pinball began to purify its besmirched image.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，彈子球的名聲突然好起來了。

sentences.english: Pin-tumbler locks are the most common.
sentences.chinese: 引腳彈子鎖是最常見的。

sentences.english: Jones simply walked over at billiards .
sentences.chinese: 在彈子戲中，瓊斯不費吹灰之力贏了。

sentences.english: We sit down in a billiard parlor on the Avenue du Maine and order hot Coffee.
sentences.chinese: 我們在梅園大道上一家彈子房中坐下要了熱咖啡。

sentences.english: Score out the testing of ball bursting for Elastane fabric.
sentences.chinese: 取消了氨綸織物彈子頂破強力的考覈。

sentences.english: Some of them were big as marbles.
You might just set a pin or two that way.
sentences.chinese: 用這個方法你也許只突破了一兩個彈子。

sentences.english: Playing marble and soccer are my favorite.
sentences.chinese: 打彈子和踢足球都是我的最愛。
